nodes.text: Harta was an Ishi Tib male who was the father of Salju, the proprietor of Black Spire Station in Black Spire Outpost on Batuu. When Salju was young, Harta brought her a pet named Elee.

Harta first appeared in Star Wars: Datapad, a mobile game companion to the theme park Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge. While his daughter Salju is described as human in the novel A Crash of Fate, Star Wars: Datapad depicts Harta as an Ishi Tib.
